products.title: Amor Ocean Green Vertical Blind

products.title: Burst Ocean Green Vertical Blind

Can a remote chain of tropical islands stop people from looking into your window? Could a the ocean, no? Combining it with other earthy colours is a sure-fire way of creating a space which heals and relaxes before you return to the stresses and distractions of real life.
